plot: It's not a story of a man or his daily life, but it is about how he dreams his day, without leaving his deckchair, waiting for his wife to have a breakfast together.
title: Ici ou... Là-bas?
plot_es: It's not a story of a man or his daily life, but it is about how he dreams his day, without leaving his deckchair, waiting for his wife to have a breakfast together.
